text: Heydar Alirza oglu Aliyev or Heydar Aliyev (, ; 10 May 1923 â€“ 12 December 2003), also spelled Heidar Aliev or Haidar Aliev was the third President of Azerbaijan for the New Azerbaijan Party from October 1993 to October 2003. His son Ilham Aliyev succeeded him. From 1969 to 1982, Aliyev was also the leader of Soviet Azerbaijan, effectively dominating the political life of Azerbaijan for many years. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Official website Heydar Aliyev Foundation *Envisioning the Nation - Interview: Azerbaijan's President, Heydar Aliyev Category:1923 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Ohio Category:Presidents of Azerbaijan Category:New Azerbaijan Party politicians Category:Azerbaijan Communist Party (1920) politicians Category:Soviet politicians Category:Azerbaijani communists Category:Azerbaijani nationalists Category:Former dictators Category:Burials at Alley of Honor Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Heydar Aliyev
